name: random-color
description: Module to generate random RGB colors
readme:
## random-color

Module to generate random RGB colors

```js
randomColor = require('random-color')

randomColor()
// => rgb(230, 120, 50)

randomColor(25)
// => rgb(22, 13, 5)
```

## Install

```bash
$ npm install random-color
```
